abstract: Planned Parenthood files lawsuit against Texas in effort to keep state from cutting off organization's Medicaid funding.
lead_paragraph: The group called the action by Texas, which has some of the toughest abortion restrictions in the country, politically motivated and without merit.

headline.main: Planned Parenthood Sues Texas in Dispute Over Funding for Clinics
headline.print_headline: Texas Is Sued in Dispute Over Funding for Clinics

snippet: The group called the action by Texas, which has some of the toughest abortion restrictions in the country, politically motivated and without merit.
